Hero.name: José Eduardo.
Hero.title: I build web and mobile apps.
Hero.description: I'm a software developer based in Cravinhos, SP - BR, specializing in building exceptional websites and mobile applications, and everything in between.

About.title: About Me
About.description: Hello! My name is José Eduardo and I'm Software developer specializing in building exceptional websites and mobile apps with 3+ years involved in the entire software development lifecycle providing IT solutions for public and private organizations using React.js, React Native, Next.js, Expo. Passionate about learning new technologies like ChakraUI, TailwindCSS and techniques like JAMStack, finding solutions to work challenges and being part of a collaborative environment.
About.tech: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

Contact.subtitle: What’s Next?
Contact.title: Get In Touch
Contact.description: Although I’m not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I’ll try my best to get back to you!
